recipe.ingredients: - frozen mango chunks: 1 cup - frozen banana slices: 1/2 cup - unsweetened almond milk: 1/2 cup - chia seeds: 1 tablespoon - fresh spinach: 1/2 cup - unsweetened coconut flakes: 2 tablespoons - almond slices: 1 tablespoon - fresh blueberries: 1/4 cup
recipe.directions: 1. Blend Base: In a blender, combine frozen mango chunks, frozen banana slices, almond milk, and fresh spinach. Blend until smooth and creamy, ensuring no chunks remain. 2. Prepare Toppings: Measure out chia seeds, coconut flakes, almond slices, and blueberries. 3. Assemble Bowl: Pour the smoothie mixture into a bowl and evenly spread it. Sprinkle the chia seeds, coconut flakes, almond slices, and blueberries on top of the smoothie base. 4. Serve: Enjoy immediately for the freshest taste and texture.
